title: Peace - Volume 01
description: A collection of 20 unique peaceful ambient music
longDescription:
Preview the collection:

  • Youtube


"Peace - Volume 01" is a collection of 20 unique ambient music backgrounds with an intimate, soft and positive mood ideal for your social games, adventures, space calling and aerials, meditation and many more categories.

Each track is presented with many loops for further editing.


  • That Was Beautiful: Full (02:21), 6 Loops
  • Untouched: Full (03:00), 6 Loops
  • Travel Without Moving: Full (02:02), 4 Loops
  • The Milky Way: Full (02:15), 4 Loops
  • Sunrise: Full (02:10), 4 Loops
  • Stars And Planets: Full (02:39), 4 Loops
  • Serenity: Full (02:24), 5 Loops
  • Rest In Beauty: Full (02:09), 4 Loops
  • Remembering My Youth: Full (01:42), 4 Loops
  • Pure Atmosphere: Full (02:45), 6 Loops
  • Peaceful Moments: Full (02:34), 6 Loops
  • Peaceful Bliss: Full (02:43), 6 Loops
  • Peace: Full (02:03), 6 Loops
  • Light Water: Full (02:51), 6 Loops
  • Vast: Full (02:42), 6 Loops
  • Floating Leaf: Full (02:27), 6 Loops
  • Distant Emotions: Full (02:10), 5 Loops
  • Clouds: Full (01:49), 4 Loops
  • Air Bed: Full (02:03), 5 Loops
  • Life Pause: Full (01:47), 9 Loops


Take a look: Total Game Music Collection - 500 High Quality music themes ideal for any game!

Maybe you might be interested at the other "Peace" collections:

  • Peace Vol.2 - Peace Vol.3


﻿This pack is produced by Luca Tomassini a composer with more than 20 years of expertise in music production with multiple TV, feature films and multimedia placements.
technicalDetails:
Full length tracks: 20

Loops: 105

Number of Audio Wavs: 125

Number of Audio Cues: 125

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 2:11:04

Supported Development Platforms: All


- Terms of Usage and Licensing Notes outside the game engine.

All packages by Frequently Asked Music are meant to be used within Unreal Engine. Please contact us at studio@frequentlyaskedmusic.com for further clearance in case you want to use a specific track for other purposes - YouTube videos, social marketing, promo.
